name: curren$ee
description: A budgeting app built with the MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js (MERN) stack. Worked on a team of 3 for this project. Users can login to their own accounts and enter their income and expenses, search for products on Walmart.com, view stock and crypto chart, and visualize their money flow over time with a table and multiple charts.
tech: React, React-Router, Node.js, Material-UI, Prime-React, Chart.js, MongoDB, Express, Axios, Moment.js, Passport, Mongoose, Reactstrap, Concurrently, Walmart API, react-tradingview

name: Sounds
description: A base to make a soundboard for anything. Another developer can clone this project and create their own soundboard in 2 steps as everything is dynamically created. Download below and test it out with your favorite TV show or movie as a theme.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Lodash, Bootstrap, FontAwesome, Animate.css

name: Simple Raffle
description: As simple as adding the entrant's name and number of entries and hitting submit. Allows users to save their entries to local storage and load them with ease. Randomizes multiple times and displays a shuffling animation when picking a winner.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Lodash, Moment.js, FontAwesome

name: Reddit TIL Scraper
description: A scraper for the Reddit TodayILearned subreddit. Allows users to pull latest articles from the subreddit in chronological order and save notes for articles in the Mongo database.
tech: Handlebars, jQuery, Moment.js, Axios, Cheerio, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose

name: Gif Me!
description: An app to search and view GIF images using the Giphy API. Uses Bootstrap, jQuery, and CSS animations. Add your search term to the top and pull the top 10 gifs for that search from giphy.com
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Google Fonts, Giphy API

name: Lottery Generator
description: Generates lottery numbers for Pick 3, Pick 4, Cash 5, Pick, 6, Mega Millions, and Powerball. Uses an algorithm to display a tooltip of other combinations (box, wheel) of a generated number for Pick 3 or Pick 4.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Lodash, Bootstrap, FontAwesome, Animate.css

name: React Memory Game
description: A memory game themed for Breaking Bad. Built with React using Reactstrap. Don't pick the same character twice.

name: LIRI
description: A Node.js CLI app that uses the OMDB, Spotify, and Bands In Town APIs to pull info about movies, songs, artists, and upcoming concerts.

name: Firebase Live Chat
description: A live chat app. Uses Google OAuth for user authentication and Google Firebase to allow messages to be sent, received, and displayed on the page in real time. Users can upload local images and video with Cloudinary. All posted image, video, and audio urls will display their content inline.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Moment.js, Cloudinary API, Firebase, Google OAuth

name: Quizzes
description: A set of timed quizzes that can easily be adapted and combined by changing a few lines of code. I created this to get a better understanding of Object Oriented Programming.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Lodash

name: Perfecto Importers (WIP)
description: A front-end React app built for a wine importer. End product will allow potential customers and wine buyers to learn about the company and their wine portfolio, complete with a faux cart system (for legal reasons) to calculate costs of a potential order with automated quantity discounts.
